department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (SPAC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for snow removal of sidewalks, entrances, exits and fire escapes services at Mont-Joli, Quebec.
description: Snow removal of sidewalks, entrances, exits and fire escapes services at Mont-Joli, Quebec.
full_summary:
=====================================

**EE517-240258 TAxploration of Snow Removal Services onto Sidewalks, Entrances, Exits, and Fire Escapes**

### Procurement Details

We are inviting proposals for a snow removal service at Mont-Joli, Quebec. The contractor will be responsible for clearing snow from sidewalks, entrances, exits, and fire escapes for the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

### Key Dates

*   **Publish Date:** August 22, 2023
*   **Tender Close Date:** September 8, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** No end date specified

### Requirements

This Request for Proposal seeks a contract for the provision of snow removal services at Mont-Joli, Quebec. Interested bidders should carefully review the solicitation to ensure they meet the eligibility criteria and requirements outlined in the document.

### Eligibility Criteria

Only Canadian companies eligible to participate in government funded projects are invite to bid.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price of the bid.

### Bidding Instructions

*   Submit your bid electronically on Ariba Discovery via the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17143444?extsite=MTcxNDM0NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17143444?extsite=MTcxNDM0NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Submit the complying bid documents 14 days from the RFP posting date.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please reach out to Veronique Hae Ok Pichette pursuant to veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. (TPSC/SPCS) please.
